<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />

**Trigger**

---

Your vicious strike pulls your foe closer, giving you the opportunity to grab them. Attempt to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) the triggering enemy.
